embeds.title: Dreydrin (Fiche)

An original defensive character. Sword & Shield provides powerful low-HP team barriers and DEF-scaling damage; Axe excels at punishing CC'd enemies with charge attacks and boosted damage; Rapier is a magic charging support that passively regenerates magic for the team.
